participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and dedicated, always striving to learn more.
participant_1.background: I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park. I'm interested in trying new things and expanding my horizons. My favorite band is the Avett Brothers. I am 6 feet tall. I am still a student, but I am going to be a nurse.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, with a love for nature and animals.
participant_2.background: I'm going to spend the weekend cozying up by the fire with a good book and a cup of hot chocolate. I own a small farm where I herd cattle. I am between jobs right now, but I am looking for a new one that will allow me to travel and continue my adventures. I want people to notice me. I just bought new hoop earrings.

content.text: i am doing good, how are you?
i am doing well, what are your plans for the weekend?
i am going to spend it cozying up by the fire with a good book and a cup of hot chocolate. what are you going to do?
i am going to work on some lessons for school, i have a big test on monday and i need to be prepared.
that's great, i am currently between jobs, but i am looking for a new one that will allow me to travel and continue my adventures
that sounds like a great plan, what kind of jobs are you looking for?
i am interested in anything that will allow me to travel and meet new people, i am also interested in working with animals
that sounds like a great goal, i hope you find something that you enjoy
thank you, i am sure i will
what kind of animals do you like working with?
i like working with all kinds of animals, but i have a special place in my heart for cows
that's great, i am not a big fan of cows, but i can see why they would be fun to work with
i love cows, they are so calm and gentle, and they are very smart animals
that's good to know, i have never really been around cows so i did not know that
i think you would like cows if you got to know them, they are very friendly and they love to be pette
